detaileddescription.para:
Rationals: It was decided to have only one SW unit for the entire module, because the overall complexity for this functionality is not very high, and the interaction between functions has a good comprehensibility. Also the splitting of the module in functions took in consideration the already defined interfaces on SWA level, the content of the requirements valid for this component, and to have an easy to understand and maintainable code when implementing the SWDD.
Alternatives: Based on the type of data that have to be processed from RL78 the module could be splitted in more SW units. One main unit that contains the implementation of sending and receiving the DiagInfo data from RL78, and other SW units for HW version, DTC(s) setting and processing, CRC32 calculation, etc.
